name: DrDougPhD
tagline: Just a regular ol' webpage for some Midwestern grad student.
body:
### Hi.
I'm Doug.
I'm a PhD student at the Missouri University of Science and Technology.
Sometimes I like to write code.
It might be useful to someone, but most likely it'll just serve some purpose for me.

Thanks for stopping by.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
